title: Love Song to a Husband
description:
Readings from:
Song of Songs 2:3-4, 8-13
Today's passages were read by Caroline Thompson, Marketing Specialist for Lifeway’s Bible Publishing team based in Nashville TN. 
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
